name: WORM | LD48
description:
WORM

It's a race against time to prevent your computer being messed up by a nasty hacker.

Can you find the virus and delete it before that happens?

Can you defeat...

THE WORM?

Complete minigames to find the correct folders and track the malware down.

Try to delete it before the WORM deletes YOU.




Worm was developed for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper.

Code by Tim Sanderson and Daniel Korsah

Art by Jess Foley and Max Well

Music and Sound Design by Ross Somerville

Known issues and fixes:

Playing online shows a blank screen instead of the end cutscene. The cutscene for failing can be correctly viewed with the windows build.

Playing the windows build prevents volume changes in game. Volume sliders can be manipulated fine on the main menu.
